content: crochet beanie hat size teen/adult - hat will stretch to fit up to 23 head circumference materials 1 ball light-worsted weight or sport-weight wool or acrylic yarn thinner softer yarns make more flexible hats size us h/8 or us i/9 hook or size to obtain gauge gauge approx 4 sts = 1 in single_crochet note hat sizes may vary depending on yarn thickness and hook size as you crochet try hat on your own head to determine snug fit and suitable length to cover ears rounds are worked continuously do not join use contrast yarn to mark beginning of round beanie round 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook or use disappearing loop around finger technique for starting ring then pull to close ring when first few rounds of hat are complete round 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet 2 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around 11 single_crochet round 3 * 2 single_crochet in ea single_crochet repeat from * around 22 single_crochet 1 round 4 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around 22 single_crochet round 5 * single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 33 single_crochet round 6 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around 33 single_crochet round 7 * single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 44 single_crochet round 8 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around 44 single_crochet round 9 * single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 55 single_crochet round 10 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around 55 single_crochet round 11 * single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 66 single_crochet round 12 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around 66 single_crochet if hat seems big enough at this point skip to round 16 if not keep increasing round 13 * single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 77 single_crochet round 14 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around 77 single_crochet if hat seems big enough at this point skip to round 16 if not increase one more time round 15 * single_crochet in next 6 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 88 single_crochet round 16 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around repeat round 16 until hat measures approx 8 to 9 from beginning fasten_off and weave in ends if necessary to make hat fit more snugly over ears work a decrease round before finishing off as follows * single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet single_crochet next 2 single_crochet decrease repeat from * around don t worry if you have a few sts left over work 1 or 2 rounds even fasten_off and weave in
